headline: Is Sterling's Project Selection Enough to Drive Superior Returns?
summary: STRL's shift to high-value, mission-critical projects is lifting margins, cash flow and returns. Can disciplined bidding sustain outperformance?

headline: Is Emcor Group (EME) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for Emcor Group (EME) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?
